thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 47 of 3654
thread.title: Ray

author: Ray
title: Ray
text: Great selection. It would be helpful if it showed where the books were coming from so customers could pick copies closest to them. My only complaint is how long shipping can take for certain books, but that could be eased if I knew from the moment I selected the item for purchase where it shipped from. I enjoy the reading rewards program, and it would be nice if more promo codes were sent out for holidays or even your birthday to make the site stand out.
